mapper.update:
update station_info
station_info.create_time = #{createTime},
station_info.full_name = #{fullName},
station_info.input_code = #{inputCode},
station_info.is_delete = #{isDelete},
station_info.job_type = #{jobType},
station_info.operator = #{operator},
station_info.short_name = #{shortName},
station_info.station_code = #{stationCode},
station_info.station_grade = #{stationGrade},
station_info.station_type = #{stationType},
station_info.status = #{status},
station_info.ternout_num = #{ternoutNum},
station_info.thigh_track_num = #{thighTrackNum},
station_info.track_division_id = #{trackDivisionId},
station_info.update_time = #{updateTime}
where station_info.id = #{id}
mapper.select: select station_info.create_time, station_info.full_name, station_info.id, station_info.input_code, station_info.is_delete, station_info.job_type, station_info.operator, station_info.short_name, station_info.station_code, station_info.station_grade, station_info.station_type, station_info.status, station_info.ternout_num, station_info.thigh_track_num, station_info.track_division_id, station_info.update_time form station_info where station_info.id = #{id}
